description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Osaka, Japan. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Ultimate Osaka Luxury: Sky-High Umeda Escape with Oversized Rooms, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
hotels.description: Discover a new level of luxury at InterContinental Osaka by IHG, a sophisticated sanctuary in the heart of Umeda’s Grand Front Osaka complex. With direct access to some of the city’s most coveted dining, shopping and entertainment - and just moments from Osaka Station - it’s a convenient launchpad for exploring Osaka and venturing further afield to Kyoto, Kobe and Nara. Space is a true luxury in Japan, and here it’s offered in abundance. Each light-filled room is framed by floor-to-ceiling windows and styled with contemporary design and understated Japanese elegance. Explore a suite of five-star facilities, including the Meguri Spa & Wellness, which specialises in traditional Japanese treatments. There’s also an indoor pool, jet bath, sauna, expansive fitness centre and an authentic Japanese bathhouse. Culinary experiences are just as elevated, with five distinct dining venues to tempt every palate. Sample delicate pastries at STRESSED Patisserie, sip cocktails to the sound of live music at the swanky gin-focused adee Lounge & Bar, or savour refined French cuisine at Michelin-starred Pierre - the crown jewel of the hotel’s dining scene.

hotels.title: Osaka Serene Sanctuary in Entertainment District
hotels.description: Surrounded by luminous neon lights and indulgent street eats, ANA Crowne Plaza Osaka, an IHG Hotel, is a calming refuge to retreat to after a day indulging in fun, fashion and food. Gaze out over calming views of the Dojima River, savour gastronomic greatness at the many onsite restaurants or take a refreshing plunge into the indoor pool before adventuring out onto the energetic streets of Dotonbori or retiring to a lavish guest room for a sound slumber.

hotels.title: Stylish Osaka Escape in Bustling & Vibrant Entertainment District
hotels.description: The contemporary Holiday Inn Osaka Namba, an IHG Hotel, gives you access to culinary culture, extensive entertainment and an abundance of vibrant shopping opportunities. Step outside the hotel and shop up a storm at the myriad of department stores nearby, line up at the world-famous Okonomiyaki Mizuno, or take in the breathtaking vistas of greater Osaka from observation deck of Tsutenkaku tower. The best of Osaka really is at your doostep from this centrally located base.

hotels.title: Prestigious Osaka Riverside Retreat with 17 Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: A tranquil Japanese oasis in the heart of Osaka awaits with a stay at the prestigious RIHGA Royal Hotel Osaka, Vignette Collection. From the moment you step inside this high-end hotel, expect to be mesmerised and calmed as you are met with awe-inspiring architecture - like a waterfall in the main lounge area - and a warm Japanese welcome. Make the most of the world-class facilities, boutique shopping and 17 onsite restaurants and bars for an Osaka stay you're unlikely to forget.

hotels.title: Central Contemporary Osaka City Break
hotels.description: Japan's culinary capital awaits: choose voco Osaka Central, an IHG Hotel, as your base while you hop between the city's best sushi, teppanyaki and ramen restaurants. Striking the perfect balance between modern and traditional, the hotel features historical Kyomachi elements with contemporary furnishings throughout. When you start craving a succulent steak for dinner, head to the Western Grill Retaurant, or if it's happy hour and you're after a tipple or two, the onsite bar is at your disposal.

hotels.title: Central Osaka InterContinental Luxury with Five Dining Options & Japanese Bathhouse
hotels.description: Japan's vibrant culinary capital of Osaka is awaiting your visit, and there's no better base than the InterContinental Osaka, an IHG Hotel. Between excursions exploring the city, retreat to the calm of the fourth floor, home to an indoor swimming pool, fitness centre and Japanese-style baths. When hunger strikes, the five onsite eateries are sure to satisfy any cravings, with sophisticated Michelin-starred French cuisine a highlight.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Five-Star Osaka Escape Above Namba Station with Six Restaurants
hotels.description: Embrace the vibrant energy of Osaka with a stay at this elegant five-star Swissôtel oasis, perfectly positioned in the heart of the Namba district. Spend your time swimming laps in the heated indoor pool, relax with a Japanese sauna and bath or embark on a gastronomic journey across the hotel's six restaurants and bars, specialising in dim sums, teppanyaki-style dining and modern European cuisine. If you're looking to explore, the bustling shopping district of Shinsaibashi is only moments away, while Dotonbori and Kuromon also make for great attractions and give a peep into the city's lively nightlife. Back at your hotel, sip on well-crafted cocktails from Table36, perched on the hotel's topmost floor and enjoy the glittering cityscape of Osaka.
